entry.title: Using AI Makes Workers Feel Lonely—And Could Hurt Productivity
entry.summary: A more efficient office is not necessarily a happier one when AI is involved, says the Harvard Business Review.

entry.title: Open Source AI Coalition Plans New Model to Compete With Stable Diffusion
entry.summary: The Open Model Initiative says it's gunning to have its new AI model ready within the next three to six months.

entry.title: ‘Elden Ring’ Parent Company Hit With Ransomware Attack
entry.summary: A group known as "Black Suit" has reportedly demanded payment, threatening to make stolen information public.

entry.title: Hyundai Has Robots That Deliver Coffee and Park Cars
entry.summary: One of the robots is slated to be deployed at the company's U.S. plant in Georgia.

entry.title: Coinbase Won't Handle AI Token Merger for Users
entry.summary: The cryptocurrency exchange said users will need to transfer their tokens to a self-custody wallet to swap their tokens.

entry.title: Pimple Problems? Have You Tried Using Brian Armstrong's Face?
entry.summary: Base face! On-chain beauty company KIKI World and Base have collaborated on pimple patches featuring the pixelated face of Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong.

entry.title: Will Biden and Trump Face Off Over Crypto Tonight?
entry.summary: Thursday’s presidential debate, hosted by CNN, could thrust Bitcoin and crypto into the political limelight.

entry.title: Chewy Stock Skyrockets After GameStop Bull Roaring Kitty Tweets Cartoon Dog
entry.summary: Roaring Kitty (aka Keith Gill) can influence more than just GameStop's stock price, as seen with Chewy and other pet-care companies Thursday.

entry.title: Solana ETFs Could Beat Bitcoin Gains, Be Fast-Tracked in Trump Admin: GSR
entry.summary: Crypto market-maker GSR is bullish on Solana's ETF prospects in the U.S.—particularly if Donald Trump is elected as president in November.

entry.title: Ethereum Price Prediction Market Launches on PancakeSwap—With AI
entry.summary: The platform launches as sites like PolyMarket see a surge of activity heading into the U.S. elections in November.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, ETFs see another small net inflow. The US government sends 3940 BTC to exchanges. Spot ETH ETFs may be coming July 4th. Coinbase sues SEC over FOIA inquiries. Most ‘obvious & attractive’ buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: Solana Will Get Support for Worldcoin’s World ID
entry.summary: Wormhole will tap Solana-based protocols to verify user’s Worldcoin World IDs that were originally verified on Ethereum.

entry.title: Telegram Game Notcoin Teases 'Fresh Start' as It Gives Out Millions in NOT
entry.summary: After kick-starting the Telegram gaming trend, Notcoin is hinting at its next moves—and something to do with TON project Lost Dogs Co.

entry.title: Solana DEX Zeta Markets' Airdrop Goes Off With a Bang as ZEX Token Soars
entry.summary: Zeta Markets' token doubled in value Thursday, shattering pre-market expectations for the Solana perpetuals DEX airdrop.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpeak to Acquire Rival GRIID in $155 Million Deal
entry.summary: The deal provides Bitcoin miner CleanSpark with a clear pathway toward 400 megawatts of power capacity in Tennessee, its CEO said.

entry.title: Blast Price Rebounds After Ethereum Layer-2's Massive Airdrop
entry.summary: Ethereum layer-2 network Blast regained steam late Wednesday following mixed reactions to its airdrop, though it's been cooling since.

entry.title: Solana Price Spikes After VanEck Files for First ETF in US
entry.summary: Solana's price jump comes as a response to VanEck's filing for a spot Solana ETF, marking a potential shift in the cryptocurrency's market trend.

entry.title: Half a Billion Was Lost to Crypto Hacks and Fraud in Q2, Says Immunefi
entry.summary: That's almost double the amount that was stolen during Q2 last year, according to the crypto bug bounty platform.

entry.title: VanEck Files for Solana ETF in US, Following Bitcoin and Ethereum Approvals
entry.summary: Solana ETFs could be the next big push after Bitcoin and Ethereum approvals in the United States, as VanEck files for the first attempt.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Is Suing the SEC and FDIC Over Public Records
entry.summary: "This is no way to regulate. And this is no way to operate a transparent government," said Coinbase's Paul Grewal.

entry.title: This Worldcoin Competitor Is Using ZK Proofs to Preserve Anonymity
entry.summary: RariMe makes many of the same claims as its competitor, Worldcoin—but says it can verify your identity and age without scanning your eyeball.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Broader Market Choppy Ahead of US GDP Report
entry.summary: A strong GDP would likely bolster the Fed’s resolve to leave rates unchanged. But weak GDP data might make interest rate cuts more alluring.

entry.title: OpenAI Delays Release of Controversial Voice Feature, Sparking Backlash
entry.summary: OpenAI pushed back the release of its Voice Mode for ChatGPT, and users are not happy.

entry.title: Avalanche Shooter 'BloodLoop' Launches Play-to-Airdrop via Epic Games Store
entry.summary: Overwatch-esque hero shooter BloodLoop has launched its play-to-airdrop campaign alongside its Epic Games Store debut on PC.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Is Near an All-Time Low—Why?
entry.summary: The halving and falling Bitcoin prices are squeezing miner revenues, but mining company stocks are still doing well.

entry.title: Crypto Saved Julian Assange, His Brother Says
entry.summary: Julian Assange would have never gained his freedom without support from the crypto community, his half-brother told Decrypt this week.

entry.title: What to Expect From Xai as It Aims to Become Ethereum Gaming's Valve
entry.summary: After launching Vanguard: Genesis campaign and seeing surging transactions, Ethereum gaming network Xai has a busy rest of 2024 planned.

entry.title: ‘Cryptoqueen’ Ruja Ignatova Gets New $5 Million Bounty From FBI
entry.summary: U.S. law enforcement officials remain on the hunt for the infamous suspect despite reports that she had been murdered in 2018.

entry.title: GameStop Stock Down as Veteran Trader Slams Roaring Kitty for Stoking 'Envy and Greed'
entry.summary: As GameStop dips again, NYSE floor trader Peter Tuchman says social media-savvy traders like Roaring Kitty are misusing their influence.

entry.title: US Government Just Sent $240M in Bitcoin to Coinbase—Another Selloff?
entry.summary: The move adds to a growing wave of downward price pressure from miners and other whales.

entry.title: What Happens to 'Deadrop' and Midnight Society With Dr. Disrespect Booted?
entry.summary: With Dr. Disrespect being dropped from game studio Midnight Society, what will happen to its extraction shooter game Deadrop?

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‘securities fraud’. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‘a stable asset like gold’. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.

entry.title: Nigeria SEC Gives Crypto Firms 30 Days to Register—Or Face Enforcement Action
entry.summary: The African nation ranked second on Chainalysis’ Global Crypto Adoption Index last year.

entry.title: Blast Airdrop Muddled by Scams From Verified Gold-Check Twitter Users
entry.summary: A minefield of malicious links befell Twitter, as scammers appeared to leverage tools meant for verified organizations amid Blast's airdrop.

entry.title: Florida Man Convicted for Violent Home Invasions to Steal Victims' Bitcoin
entry.summary: Remy St Felix was found guilty of leading a crew to conduct home invasions across multiple states—with the explicit goal of swiping crypto.

entry.title: Ethereum ETF Issuers Are Already Racing to Drop Fees
entry.summary: VanEck joins Franklin Templeton in saying its Ethereum ETF will have no fee when it begins trading.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 145 - WE SURVIVED!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Send and Receive Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Join Rug Radio creator and crypto influencer Mika as she guides you through the process of sending and receiving cryptocurrency using the Kraken wallet.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 144 - A VERY RED DAY
entry.summary: BTC hits 6-week lows, $215m liquidations in fall. Mt Gox set to start BTC repayments in July. Fear & Greed index nears 2024 lows. Bitfinex whales’ long positioning rebounds. Open Interest rises as shorts grow, funding negative. BTC is economic immortality, going to $10m: Saylor. Moment of truth for BTC to rebound: Ansem. Expect $61-62k BTC to hold: Emperor BTC. SOL upgrade is big step-change: Raoul Pal. Expect slow melt-up from ETH ETF: DC Investor. MKR falls 11% as delegate gets phished. TON ecosystem sees phishing attacks spread.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 143 - CRYPTO TRENDS LOWER
entry.summary: Crypto sinks, ETFs see another $140m outflow. German government likely sells $195m more BTC. 100 day BTC break-out coming: Don Alt. SOL ETF applied for in Canada. Rumours SEC case vs Coinbase also dropped. Standard Chatered setup spot trading desk. ARB has record daily revenue on LayerZero claims. CFTC investigating Jump Crypto. FTM outperforms ahead of Sonic upgrade. Binance integrates USDT on TON. Onchain prediction market TVL continues to soar.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY
entry.summary: ETH continues to lead gains, SOL underperforms. BTC may rebound as Fed liquidity rips higher. ETH sees large amount of bullish call activity. LayerZero launches today, 25% unlock. Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats. Jump Crypto gives $10m to crypto PAC. Binance launches HODLer airdrops. TipLink allows SOL transfers by email. ETHFI proposes 50% revenue for buybacks. JTO teases LSD backed stablecoin. JUP team proposes to reduce 30% of supply.

entry.title: This Robotics Company Aims to Solve a Labor Shortage in Manufacturing
entry.summary: GrayMatter Robotics Co-founder and CEO Ariyan Kabir explains the origin of the company, the need for artificial intelligence and robotics to offset a growing labor shortage, and takes Decrypt on a tour of its AI-powered facility.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 141 - SEC DROPS ETH PROBE
entry.summary: BTC: 65.4k (0%), ETH: 3545 (+3%), SOL: 139 (+2%). Top Gainers: LDO, BRETT, PEPE, AR. ETH & beta lead gains after SEC headline. SEC drops probe into ETH as a security. BTC ETFs see another $152m outflow. Pantera show $100m buying interest in ETH ETF. Pantera aims to raise new $1bn fund. Lack of staking won’t harm ETH ETF: 21 Shares. LayerZero airdrop coming June 20th. SEC concerns on USDC may delay Circle IPO. Hayes increasing PENDLE & DOGE positions. Fox News to build L2 with Polygon. EIGEN trades at $10bn pre-market. Drift & Ondo partner on RWAs. Commercial real estate coming on-chain: KPMG.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 140 - MARKETS DOWN BAD
entry.summary: BTC touches 1-month lows, dominance hits 56%. $500m of liquidations in fall, $146m ETF outflows. VanEck to launch first ETF in Australia. Coinbase to launch pre-market trading. 56% of Fortune 500 building in web3. Uphold to delist USDT in EU due to MiCA. TON flips DOGE in sell-off. Base DEX users now 2nd place after SOL. Ethena launches staking & restaking with Symbiotic. Lens aiming to raise $50m at $500m valuation. Two ‘crazy’ MATIC announcements coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 139 - WHATS THE NEXT META?
entry.summary: BTC again breaks $66k, dominance rises. Fear & Greed index hits 3 month low. Whales continue to be in accumulation mode. Miners 33 days into capitulation, average 41 days. Financial advisors not buying BTC yet: BlackRock. Crypto funds saw $600m outflows last week. ZKsync airdrop live, prices at $5bn FDV. ZKsync defend sybil measures. Low float, high FDV coins get hammered again. Tether launches product backed by Gold. Korean exchanges reviewing 600 coins for delisting. ETH ETF ‘sell the rumour, buy the news event’. BTC ETF basis buyers roughly 15% of demand. CVX bounces 100% after loan liquidation. TON sees fastest user growth in crypto history. APT may flip SOL in 1-3 years: Hayes. Crypto lifetime funding eclipses $100bn. SEC claims $876m Ripple fine still fair. Gensler could cost Biden election: Cuban.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 138 - MORE CELEB COINS!
entry.summary: Altcoins bleed out heavy, BTC dominance rises towards 60%. Miners continue to be large BTC sellers, whales accumulate. ETF inflows slow, hedge fund allocations point to basis trades. ETH ETFs approvals see little movement, coming 'in the summer’. Stocks continue to hit ATHs as CPI & PPI both come in soft. TON performs best in L1s, active wallets eclipse ETH. Andrew Tate joins celebrity memecoin meta, DADDY hits $350m. SOL DEX volumes eclipse ETH in memecoin frenzy. Curve founder defaults on CRV debt as DeFi coins tumble. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon to pay $4.5bn fine to SEC. BAMK hits $350m in Runes as it issues BTC stablecoin. Gaming tokens face huge sell-off, PRIME changes tokenomics.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 137 - CRYPTO DIPS FURTHER
entry.summary: Crypto falls after slightly hawkish Fed speech. BTC whales buy $1.4bn in 24hrs. Miners continue to be large sellers of BTC. BTC ETFs see $100m inflows. MicroStrategy to raise $500m to buy BTC. Egorov CRV debt positions begin to liquidate . Circle to support SOL for wallets. 4% of Turkey GDP used to buy stablecoins. QuantMatter say $11m stolen from OKX account. Biden to use Coinbase for crypto donations. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon set to pay $4.5bn fine. Franklin Templeton write report on SOL DePin. TON flips ETH for active addresses. Moonpay & Paypal integration goes live in EU & UK.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 136 - FIRST MOTHER, NOW DADDY?
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see another $200m outflows. Another $190m of liquidations in volatility. $1.2bn BTC leaves exchanges in a day. ETF flows largely driven by basis trades: Pal. ‘Perfect setup’ for longs into macro news today. ETH ETF approvals ‘expected this month’. Crypto in best place it has ever been: Circle CEO. China’s ICBC calls ETH ‘digital oil’. Trump wants ‘made in the USA’ BTC. Crypto hacks $19bn since 2011. Symbiotic restaking protocol sees $150m inflows. Polygon launches $720m grants program. ZKsync accused of insider allocations. CRV drop leaves $90m loans at risk.

entry.title: Has AI Already Changed Gaming Forever?
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Sander Lutz and Rug Radio creator Puke sat down with Simon Davis of Mighty Bear Games and VC Kyle Klemmer to discuss how AI has already remade the gaming industry—for better and for worse.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 135 - BTC FALLS ON OUTFLOWS
entry.summary: Crypto falls as ETFs see first outflow in 19 days. Short positions grow on downwards move in BTC. BTC short-term realised price now at $64k. ETH ETF issuers still waiting for SEC response. UK ETNs continue to see tiny volume. SOL validators get kicked out for sandwich attacks. ZKsync airdrop happening next week. ZKsync to give 17.8% to the community. OP launches Fraud Proofs. Bitfarms plans poison pill to counter takeover bid. OKX sees outflows after security incidents. Bybit considers shutting China offices. COIN may get added to S&P500.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 134 - EU SNAP ELECTIONS LAND
entry.summary: Volatility remains low, TL continues to be divisive. 2nd highest weekly close ever for BTC. Crypto funds saw $2bn inflows last week. Rumour that BlackRock will apply for SOL ETF. Base TVL hits $8bn, top of L2s for activity. zk Sync hint at TGE this week. PENDLE enters top 5 for DeFi TVL. Berachain v2 testnet goes live.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 133 - RUGGED BY HOGEN?
entry.summary: BTC still just below ATH after $218m ETF inflows. BTC OI hits record $37bn as long-short ratio rises. Amount of ETH on exchanges lowest since 2015. Franklin Templeton explores broader crypto fund. Mining stocks rise on takeover frenzy. Kraken considers $100m funding round. Binance reinstates crypto buys with Mastercard. Phantom & Jito partner for native staking.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 132 - CRYPTO STRENGTH IS GROWING
entry.summary: Crypto consolidates near ATH, $488m ETF inflow. BTC correlation to tech stocks highest since 2023. BTC options anticipate $74-80k move. ETH to $22k by 2030: VanEck. Robinhood to acquire Bitstamp. Coinbase launches Smart Wallet. ByBit opens up explicitly to China users. Global liquidity breaks out to $94T. US President given new powers to block crypto. Cramer & Gensler continue to bash crypto. Gensler hints at prolonged ETH ETF process. Stand with Crypto PAC hits 1m advocates. Turkey denies plans to tax crypto. EigenLayer surpasses $20bn TVL. IONET to launch on Binance.

entry.title: Webinar: Unleashing The Power Of Permissionless Markets With Vega Protocol
entry.summary: Join our expert panel for an insightful discussion on Vega Protocol's revolutionary approach to decentralized derivatives trading. Discover how Vega's permissionless markets enable anyone to create and trade futures and perpetuals on a fully decentralized network. Explore the potential of Vega's innovative features, such as the ability to add new assets, transfer network assets, and adjust network parameters—as well as the protocol's active markets.
